item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 27, 2024 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: App that asks 'why?' every time you unlock your phone (97 points | 39 comments)
2. Raspberry Pi CM5 is 2-3x faster, drop-in upgrade (mostly) (29 points | 10 comments)
3. The capacitor that Apple soldered incorrectly at the factory (184 points | 60 comments)

5. I Wrote "Janet for Mortals" (86 points | 8 comments)
6. Launch HN: Human Layer (YC F24) – Human-in-the-Loop API for AI Systems (303 points | 175 comments)
7. I Didn't Need Kubernetes, and You Probably Don't Either (237 points | 215 comments)
8. Htmy – Async, pure-Python rendering engine (76 points | 26 comments)
9. Teen mathematicians tie knots through a mind-blowing fractal (238 points | 37 comments)

11. Executing ARM Jazelle (JVM Bytecode) on the Wii's Starlet (65 points | 8 comments)

13. ZetaOffice: LibreOffice in the Browser (163 points | 57 comments)
14. The WTF-8 Encoding (4 points | discuss)

17. Spies Jumped from One Network to Another via Wi-Fi in an Unprecedented Hack (113 points | 42 comments)
18. The Many Faces of the Kingdom of Shu (20 points | 9 comments)

22. The Nursery of the Mac – Apple Computer factory in Cork, Ireland (1996) (26 points | 5 comments)
23. FQL: A KV Query Language (49 points | 8 comments)
24. Show HN: Silent Poems – Visual expression of unspoken thoughts (97 points | 22 comments)
25. I Stopped Using Kubernetes. Our DevOps Team Is Happier Than Ever (98 points | 72 comments)
26. Quark: Real-Time, High-Resolution, and General Neural View Synthesis (9 points | discuss)
27. We can mine asteroids for space food (142 points | 164 comments)
28. D-Link says it won't patch 60k older modems (188 points | 108 comments)
29. Creating a social photo frame from scratch (27 points | 10 comments)
30. Sombrero Galaxy dazzles in new James Webb image (73 points | 38 comments)
